Name: TETRIX 3D
About the game: A 3D remake of the ageless classic puzzle game. Familiar Tetris gameplay with new features. Move, rotate blocks, clear lines! Classic Mode Play by your own rules set new records. Campaign Mode Go through all stages, from a simple walk to a real challenge to your reaction and logic. Set to Your Liking Change the block type from ordinary tetromino blocks to complex 3D monsters. Adjust pit depth from 6 to 12 lines. Choose an interface style from classic to cyberpunk! Enjoy the gameplay with pleasant music in up to 4k resolution. Let nothing distract from the game and new records !!!
